name: Candy Climb
description:
Title: Candy Climb
Type : Arcade
Platform: Android

Description:
Avoid the obstacles, collect as many coins as you can and reach the summit! Will your reflexes be enough to make you survive?

Put your skills at stake in this sweet arcade! Collect coins, improve your score and buy new and fantastic sweets to add to your collection.

  • Colorful High Definition Graphics!
  • Improve your score and compare it with the rest of the world!
  • 27+ Different Candy in Candy Shop!
  • Every week NEW sweets to unlock!
  • Cloud Save System integrated!

noAds version eliminates both the commercials spot and the cost of the ticket for each game!
You can find it in the Candy Shop!
